scripts.build:client:plain:dev: npm run build:client:plain:generic && npm run build:client:plain:uglyfy:dev
scripts.build:client:plain:prod: npm run build:client:plain:generic && npm run build:client:plain:uglyfy:prod
scripts.build:client:plain:generic: npm run build:client:plain:license-report && npm run build:client:plain:html && npm run build:client:plain:images && npm run build:client:plain:sass:prod && npm run build:client:plain:tsc && npm run build:client:plain:fonts
scripts.build:client:plain:fonts: npx copyfiles -u 3 src-client/plain/fonts/*/*.woff2 dist/client/plain && npx copyfiles -u 3 src-client/plain/fonts/**/*.txt dist/client/plain
scripts.build:client:plain:license-report: npx mkdirp built/license && npx license-report --output=json > built/license/license-page-data.json && npx ts-node helper/generate-license-page-data.ts ../built/license/license-page-data.json > src-client/plain/js/pages/license-data.ts
scripts.build:client:plain:sass:debug: npm run build:client:plain:sass -- ./dist/client/plain/client.np.css && npm run build:client:plain:autoprefixer -- -o ./dist/client/plain/client.css ./dist/client/plain/client.np.css
scripts.build:client:plain:sass:prod: npm run build:client:plain:sass -- ./dist/client/plain/client.np.min.css --style=compressed && npm run build:client:plain:autoprefixer -- -o ./dist/client/plain/client.min.css ./dist/client/plain/client.np.min.css
scripts.build:client:plain:tsc: npx tsc --project src-client/plain/tsconfig.client-plain.json && npx browserify built/tsc/main.js -o built/tsc/main.bundle.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint:eslint && npm run lint:stylelint
scripts.selenium: npx tsc --project test-client/tsconfig.selenium.json && npx mocha built/test/**/*.tests.js --timeout 10000
